synopsis.text: Myu, an enigmatic girl with a peculiar audio jack on her body, crosses paths with Echo Rec, a young tech enthusiast, in a world devoid of music. Together, they embark on a transformative journey to restore the lost melodies and rhythms to their silent world. In this post-apocalyptic future, humanity is plagued by sinister creatures known as the Earless, and society's protectors are the Players, who pilot powerful mecha called Equipment to vanquish these foes. As Echo and Myu delve deeper into their quest, they uncover secrets about Myu's past and her connection to a legendary Player named Jimi Stonefree. With their newfound friendship and shared determination, the duo aims to shake the very core of their world and reintroduce music to humanity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
